commits.message:
Add support for EC2 tagging (EUCA-4714)

Support is added for EC2 tag operations:

  CreateTags
  DeleteTags
  DescribeTags

A Tags groovy file is added for tag messages and a new TagManager
service class is added / configured for messages of type
ResourceTagMessage. A new InvalidParameterValueException is added and
thrown if a tag key or value is not acceptable. Bindings for tags have
been updated.

Entity classes are updated with a reference to their tags (to support
cascading deletion). Tag instances have been added for each entity type
(SnapshotTag, VolumeTag, etc). AccountMetadata now allows
"createUniqueName" to be overridden in case the default implementation
is not sufficiently unique, this is overridden by Tag to include the
account name, resource type, resource identifier and tag key.

CloudMetadata is updated to include TagMetadata (type "tag"). PolicySpec
is updated to include a new resource for tags.

Entities has been updated to include a count method to allow counting
the number of entities that match an example object.
